Breakout Game
This Breakout arcade game version was developed by Vincy Shrine as part of coursework for Human Computer Interaction taken by Professor John Cole at UT Dallas

Description 
This version allows one player to bounce a ball upward from a moveable paddle,and hit the bricks to score points
When the ball fails to bounce on the paddle, but falls beyond it, you lose a life 
As the game progresses, the difficulty level increases, when player reaches ORANGE bricks - the paddle size is reduced and ball speed is increased 

Features / Open issues
 - Using both hands works best to move paddle. Long press on either side of paddle, to move it smoothly
 - If the ball speed is set too high, game gets over in a second
 - If a ball hits on more than one brick at a time, although number of hits > 1, the bricks disappear
 - Ball moves in the direction of phone tilt (Accelerometer)
 - During night, the background image turns spooky (Light sensor) 

References: Course material, Google
